Actions.Name: Get Photo
Actions.Description: Retrieve a specific Photo from its id.

Actions.Name: Get Video
Actions.Description: Retrieve a specific Video from its id.

Actions.Name: List Curated Photos
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of real-time photos curated by the Pexels team.

Actions.Name: List Popular Videos
Actions.Description: Retrieves a list of the current popular videos.

Actions.Name: Search for Photos
Actions.Description: Search Pexels for any photos that you would like. For example your query could be something broad like Nature, Tigers, People. Or it could be something specific like Group of people working.

Actions.Name: Search for Videos
Actions.Description: Search Pexels for any videos that you would like. For example your query could be something broad like Nature, Tigers, People. Or it could be something specific like Group of people working.
